title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog in Java, no results are shown. However, searching via the context menu in the Packages view works as expected.
OB: The Search dialog in the Package view initializes with the fully qualified name of the element. When searching for declarations, this fully qualified name is not found. Instead, the search should attempt to find the Java element first, and if that fails, display the element name without the fully qualified name.
